index.title: Surf
index.sectionDesc: Join one of our active servers and start playing with the community. Each game mode offers unique challenges and experiences.
index.featuresDesc: Experience the best surfing community with professional servers and active moderation.
index.realTimeDesc: Real-time leaderboards and detailed statistics tracking your progress across all game modes and maps.
index.performanceDesc: High performance servers, smooth surfing experience. Professional-grade hardware guaranteed.
index.communityDesc: Join thousands of active players, participate in events, and connect with fellow surfers from around the world.
index.comprehensiveDesc: Comprehensive analytics including personal bests, completion rates, and detailed performance metrics for every map.
index.mapsDesc: Access to hundreds of custom maps ranging from beginner-friendly to expert-level challenges.
index.fairPlayDesc: Advanced anti-cheat protection and active moderation ensure a fair and enjoyable experience for everyone.
index.ctaDesc: Join thousands of players already enjoying the ultimate CS2 surfing experience. Create your account and start climbing the rankings today!

hero.title: JOIN THE SURF
hero.subtitle: CS2 Surfing Community
hero.description: Master the art of surfing in Counter-Strike 2. Connect with fellow surfers, track your progress, and ride the waves to glory.

serverbrowser.title: Servers
serverbrowser.subtitle: Choose the gamemode and hop on the server!
